data = {
    "fetchSize": 50,

# Create a list of dictionaries, one per database

url = "https://dgvm6205.datagapsinc.in/CoreServiceRest/api/v1.0/savedQueries/datasource/581/query"

payload = "SELECT 'hello' AS greeting"

headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'text/plain',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer eyJraWQiOiJmODUyOGY5Zi1lYmU1LTRhODctOWNkZC1kMzRkMmY5ZWIwMmIiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiJ9..T20gAiWYAoaEysiV4l-6UlM4RK1h0ZzYfaSG40-jDttCoWnXyBhLEO_RSJiNn6DbjmCNPnXIZU0D5qpEeT6k_JEJIg62ZembnURtv2C60MC1_zuA_QEfBc4v02DHPyadu1h4NpUmF_bIHITMpzxrJw-hyoVZnqU9ODkrupstqNIolN4IbyZ7bhvyA1v29he-mzUAUeJc3a0AQpDQe4qeNh4-uPmAgBsp9S3jhQzGEMMZGYIwYUuYsbjP5zq4wlQGSkd-55ysB_86hmm2hCSXeLnYO1Mbk0Z3BXZ0_e0b24scE_zA3RLfnItK3zfNWhlcxrAXl99Z7vcrJ1igZeRiEA'
}

params = {
    "fetchSize": 50,
    "runCount": "false"
}

response = requests.put(

)

print(response.status_code)
print(response.text)
